html:
feareth the Lord/obeyeth…servant/walketh in darkness/no light. Isaiah asks who fears the Lord and obeys God's servant, yet still walks in darkness. The answer is, No one. Therefore, since Israel is walking by her own light rather than God's, her people were obviously not fearing God and obeying his servant.

walketh in darkness. Being without spiritual light is walking in darkness (58:8- 10; 59:9-10).
